Invigorating Pursuit

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Avenger, Censure of Pursuit class feature, oath of enmity power
Benefit: When you hit your oath of enmity target with a charge attack, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and damage rolls until the end of your next turn.

Published in Player's Handbook 2, page(s) 187.
